turns.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi, my phone has been showing "No Service" for the past few hours, and I can't make calls or use data. It's really frustrating.

I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing "No Service" â€“ that sounds frustrating. To help troubleshoot this, I first need to verify your account. Could you please provide your phone number, or your full name and date of birth (MM/DD/YYYY)? Once I have that, I can check your line status and guide you through some steps to get your service back up.
My name is John Smith, and my phone number is 555-123-2002.
